https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9Vg5T3QH7IHoEj7BPYfvVEll30E.jpg The Barada, the river around which the city of Damascus was built, is drying up. The film follows his journey through the city, its neighborhoods, its inhabitants, its noises and its smells. Before Vanishing
